name: The First Hours
description: Dexa is desperate to find her Neelix, the one who knows and loves her, who's gone missing. Investigate Neelix's recent past and beyond to determine where he might have gone... or if anyone wished him ill.
rules:
-- Unique Ferengi Traditionalist, Federation, and Maquis Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Dexa, Chakotay, D. Troi, Waddle or crew with the Costumed trait will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Dexa, Chakotay, D. Troi, Waddle or Costumed
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Saru
featured_crew.flavor: A malfunctioning holoprogram aboard the wreckage of the KSF Khi'eth made Saru appear human.

featured_crew.name: Chakotay
featured_crew.flavor: Chakotay disguised himself as Amal to infiltrate a Quarren workcamp and rescue the brainwashed crew of Voyager.

action.name: Let Me Prove Who I Am

rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Saru
rewards.flavor: A malfunctioning holoprogram aboard the wreckage of the KSF Khi'eth made Saru appear human.

rewards.name: Rarity Constellation
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill Constellation
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: A malfunctioning holoprogram aboard the wreckage of the KSF Khi'eth made Saru appear human.

rewards.name: Rarity Constellation
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Neelix is missing. I know that seems silly to say here, in this place, where there are dozens of copies of all of us from different moments in our lives... but the Neelix who knew me, who I love--he's gone!"
"I can sense your worry for him, but please remember that whatever might have taken Neelix from you could just as easily bring him back. It brought me here, after all."
"Those of us who aren't from this timeline or universe have had to make new lives here. Maybe your Neelix has--and some new enemies along the way, too. We'll look into it, I promise."
